snippet: The death has shocked this South Texas border city, but it was only the latest in a series of shootings involving realistic-looking BB guns and pellet guns.
abstract: Shooting death of Jaime Gonzalez Jr in Brownsville, Texas, school is latest in a series of shootings involving realistic-looking BB guns and pellet guns; incidents often involve police, who open fire after mistaking the replicas for real firearms; efforts to regulate possession of such BB guns in Texas and elsewhere have encountered opposition from gun groups.
lead_paragraph: The death has shocked this South Texas border city, but it was only the latest in a series of shootings involving realistic-looking BB guns and pellet guns.

headline.seo: Teenager’s Death a Reminder of Gun Replicas’ Dangers
headline.main: Texas Death Offers Grim Reminder That Gun Replicas Can Fool Police
headline.print_headline: Texas Death Offers Grim Reminder That Gun Replicas Can Fool Police
